title: World of Warcraft Wrath of the lich king 3.0.9
description:
----------------------------------------------------

Version; 

English Version enGB.


Info;

JUST DOWNLOAD AND IT'S READY TO PLAY!
JUST DOWNLOAD AND IT'S READY TO PLAY!
JUST DOWNLOAD AND IT'S READY TO PLAY!

It's not compressed to a (several) .rar file(s) only becouse estimated time to compress the entire folder was around 20h on this computer.

This contains all the 3 world of warcraft games, Wow- classic, burning crusade and Lich King. It's the european version (enGB), so it won't work in the US. It doesn't have any extra addons installed but you can get some here "http://www.lidk-addons.tk/". The game is fully updated to the version 3.0.9 and is working perfectly. 

If you don't want to pay approximently 14 Euro each month to play this game, then you can always go search for a private server. I would recomend this site "http://www.wowstatus.net/".
